channel.title: Distros on Jacob Goldstein's Website

item.title: Best Gaming Distros
item.description: Best Linux Distros for Gaming There are so many Linux distributions for gamers you would find today. If you’re confused with all the options you could choose from, we got you covered. We’ve compiled a list to help you pick the best Linux distro for your gaming preference and needs. 1. Steam OS Let’s start the list off with Steam OS. This is one of the most popular gaming distros today.
